name: Sour Melon Riser
preparation: In a shaker filled with ice, pour 2 oz of vodka, 3 oz of watermelon juice, and 0.5 oz of freshly squeezed lemon juice. Shake vigorously for 10-15 seconds. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice, then gently top with 1 oz of Red Bull. Stir lightly to mix.
garnish: Watermelon slice and a sprig of mint
backstory: Designed to electrify your senses, the Sour Melon Riser draws from the vibrant energy of summer parties and the refreshing taste of watermelon, complemented by a burst of Red Bull to keep the night young.
